description:
Let`s Start to Unite Up! The story`s journey of how the show came together featuring the characters and cast. Please enjoy this special program.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kore kara Hajimeru "UniteUp!": Monogatari no Kiseki
Let`s Start to "Unite Up!": The Story`s Journey
これからはじめる「UniteUp!」~物語のキセキ~
